caption.title: Transition probability matrices for EM synoptic systems.
caption.p: ( A) NCEP/NCAR reanalysis synoptic systems probability transition matrix for 1948–2017. ( B) CMIP5 ensemble mean probability transition matrix for 1986–2005. Rows sum up to 100%. The synoptic systems are RSTs, PTs, Highs (H), CLs, and SLs.
